content:  The Enabling Dynamic Partition Manager task is run on the SE and is performed by your IBM System Service Representative (SSR) at installation time.  If DPM is enabled, the IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ cannot run z/OS, 21CS VSEn, and z/TPF images in an LPAR or as a second level guest of z/VM. © Copyright IBM Corp. 2023. All rights reserved. 439 Chapter 11. Environmentals This chapter describes the environmental requirements for IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ. It also lists the power and cooling requirements that are needed to plan for the installation of these servers. This chapter includes the following topics:  Introduction  IBM z16 A02 environmental considerations  IBM z16 AGZ environmental considerations  Energy Management 11 Important: The purpose of this chapter is to provide general information about the environmental characteristics for IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ, available configuration options, and how the configuration options affect the environmental requirements of
